FuncDef: The display ops assistant command displays information about a maintenance assistant. The display ops assistant command displays information about a maintenance assistant.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the operation mode of a specified assistant.
The value can be current, history, or verbose.
current: indicates the status of a configured assistant.history: indicates the running records of a configured assistant.verbose: displays detailed information about a configured assistant.

Specifies the name of a maintenance assistant.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies information about a default maintenance assistant.
-

Specifies the name of a default maintenance assistant.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ops assistant current name a1
ExtraInfo:
To view information about a maintenance assistant, run the display ops assistant command.
After an alarm is generated, a log is recorded, or a timer expires, the maintenance assistant can be executed.
